name: XCUIRemoteButton
desc: A button on a physical remote control.

items.name: case up
items.desc: A constant that represents the up button on a remote.

items.name: case down
items.desc: A constant that represents the down button on a remote.

items.name: case left
items.desc: A constant that represents the left button on a remote.

items.name: case right
items.desc: A constant that represents the right button on a remote.

items.name: case home
items.desc: A constant that represents the home button on a remote.

items.name: case menu
items.desc: A constant that represents the menu button on a remote.

items.name: case playPause
items.desc: A constant that represents the play-and-pause button on a remote.

items.name: case select
items.desc: A constant that represents the select button on a remote.
